title: Ep. 7. Moonlighting - Chapter One
description: In this interlude chapter to the Adventure Zone saga, the mysteries of the universe are revealed to our heroes. Magnus has a good cry to some elevator music. Taako further unravels The Eldritch Riddle. It's about to get super weal up in here.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
